title: Regaring Mca fees..
content:
I registered for pessat interview and i have on next week but don't know what will be the seat blocking fee if selected?? 
Also i will be seeking for hostel . So do we need to pay hostel fees which is 1L/yr (not sure) at the time of hostel admission??
Pls tell me guys..

comments.body:
After interview if you are selected 
(Result will be out in a week)
They will give you another week to pay half of your yearly fee 
Basically booking fee
Then rest half you have to submit during document submition 

Keep your fee ready 

Idk anything about hostel sorry
Ok.. can u tell what questions did they ask u in interview

It differs no one asks same questions
But they mostly take 9 out of 10 ppl interviewed 
TRUST ME this isn't what you should be worried about 

The amount of stress they put on you later is
Get ready for a 8 to 4 ðŸ™ƒ

If you failed that easy of an interview 
You won't survive here 
Better of to find a different College
